content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold-layer_saprojectdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold-layer_saprojectdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold-layer@saprojectdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.tip (
	[business_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[compliment_count] bigint,
	[date] date,
	[user_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[cleaned_tip] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'yelp_academic_dataset_tip.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold-layer_saprojectdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tip
GO
